#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <string>
#include <vector>

using namespace std;

int main() {
	
	int t, i, n1, n2, flag;

	scanf("%d", &t );

	while( t-- ) {

		string s1, s2;
		cin >> s1;
		cin >> s2;
		
		n1 = s1.length();
		n2 = s2.length();

		vector<int> A( 10, 0 ), B( 10, 0 );
		if( n1 == n2 ) {

			for( i = 0;i < n1;i++ ) {
				A[ s1[ i ] - '0' ]++;
				B[ s2[ i ] - '0' ]++;
			}

			flag = 1;
			for( i = 0;i < 10;i++ )
				if( A[ i ] != B[ i ] ) {
					flag = 0;
					break;
				}

			if( flag )
				printf("1\n");
			else
				printf("0\n");
		}
		else
			printf("0\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
